alert.note: Alert for Faulk; Hand; Hyde; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 1:30AM MDT until June 24 at 2:15AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hand County in central South Dakota... Eastern Hyde County in central South Dakota... Faulk County in north central South Dakota... Spink County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 230 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Stone Lake to Polo to near Virgil, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Orient around 240 AM CDT. Seneca around 250 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Miranda, Rockham, Burkmere, Brentwood Colony, Zell, Faulkton, Thunderbird Colony, Evergreen Colony, Athol, Norbeck and Blumengard Colony. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
